synopsis.text:
When a mysterious gateway to a realm of magic and mythology suddenly appears above the Pacific Ocean, the bustling city of San Teresa becomes a vibrant fusion of Earthly and otherworldly cultures. Home to over two million inhabitants from both dimensions, this urban utopia is celebrated as the "City of Dreams." However, beneath its glamorous facade, the city grapples with the dark underbelly of crime, drugs, and prostitution.

Enter Kei Matoba, a skilled yet unconventional detective of the San Teresa Police Department, and Tilarna Exedilika, a naive but valiant knight from the enchanted world of Leto Semani. Despite their stark differences and initial clashes, the unlikely duo is forced to join forces to combat the escalating chaos that threatens the delicate balance between their parallel worlds. As they navigate through their contrasting perceptions of justice and life, Matoba and Tilarna forge an unbreakable bond while pursuing a common enemy, ultimately uncovering the true meaning of trust and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
